titles.title: The Race Is Not To The Swift

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
The race is not to the swift,
Nor the battle to the strong,
But to him that endures to the end,
So endure to the end my son.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Little children, your sins are forgiven,
And you have been born again.
But remember, this is just the beginning.
Will you be there at the end?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Young men, you have overcome,
And in you abides His word.
But remember, there are much stronger ones,
And you will need the strength of the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Fathers, you have known Him who is
The Beginning; the Father you've known.
But remember, there is no rest in this,
Not till you enter your heavenly home.
